Name: Meteorite
Description: A meteorite is a natural object originating in outer space that survives an impact with the Earth's surface without being destroyed. While in space it is called a meteoroid. Modern classification schemes divide meteorites into groups according to their structure, chemical and isotopic composition and mineralogy.

Properties.Name: Meteorite discovery location
Properties.Description: The meteorite discovery location may be different from the meteorite fall location

Properties.Name: Meteorite fall date
Properties.Description: The meteorite fall date may differ from the meteorite discovery date.

Properties.Name: Meteorite fall location
Properties.Description: The meteorite fall location may be different from the meteorite discovery location

Properties.Name: Meteorite Mass
Properties.Description: Mass of the found meteorite in grams.

Properties.Name: Meteorite observer
Properties.Description: Names of individuals who observed a transit of the meteor prior to its impact with the Earth.

Properties.Name: Meteorite surface crater (Earth)
Properties.Description: Is there a visible crater from the meteor's impact with the Earth's surface?

Properties.Name: Meteorite Source
Properties.Description: The celestial body from which this meteorite originated.
